trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around May 25th 2010
Summary: watched same bright light in the sky for three days now!
divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed a bright light hovering in the sky about ten miles west of raymond n.h.on the 23 of may at about 10:00.the same light has returned for three consecutive nights! the light is very bright and changes colors! I even have some short video clips taken on a little digital camera the light is so bright that my little camera can clearly see it and record it in the sky!! I have witnessed very strange things in the sky.my whole life,but this is the first time ive ever reported it!! THIS IS THE REAL DEAL!! I WISH I HAD A BETTER CAMERA CUZ IM SURE IT WILL BE BACK TOMARROW!!!Oh yeah it hangs around for a couple hours then slowly fades away.this isnt my first sighting so im convinced we are not alone!!!
